title: Russia Coerces Ukrainians Into Voting To Join Russian Federation  | William MacAskill
itunes:title: Russia Coerces Ukrainians Into Voting To Join Russian Federation  | William MacAskill
description:
Russia coerces Ukrainians into voting in favor of joining the Russian Federation, Ronny Chieng teaches a class on K-pop, and William MacAskill discusses his book "What We Owe the Future."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
